name: h4software
overview:
H4Software is quite unique in its concept as a multi-national online resourced software development company.

The company was started by an association between a person residing in Australia who had a specific set of requirements alongside a developer recruited online through one of the online crowd-sourcing platforms that allow you to select the best skills at the appropriate rate for the job.

H4Software Company develops framework and software utilizing the latest languages Haxe, as3, JavaScript, Java, C, C++, C#, PHP and technologies AIR, Flex, SilverLight, HTML5, Ajax applying best practices and standards that are dedicated to the people who really need and use it.

Our platform leverages an AWS cloud environment and is completely scalable depending on the needs of your company. With Amazon Elastic Computer Cloud we can use broad range technologies that standard hosting companies can’t achieve. With that in mind, our work is more scalable, reliable, faster and cheaper.
